file_summary: This file, `OwnerControllerTests`, contains unit and integration tests for the `OwnerController` within the Spring PetClinic application. Utilizing Spring Boot's `@WebMvcTest` annotation, it focuses on testing the web layer in isolation without loading the full application context. The class mocks the `OwnerRepository` using `@MockitoBean` to control data interactions, ensuring predictable test outcomes. It includes comprehensive tests for various functionalities related to owner management, such as initializing and processing forms for creating new owners, finding owners by last name (including handling no results), updating existing owner details, and displaying individual owner profiles. Each test verifies expected HTTP status codes, model attributes, and view names, ensuring the controller behaves correctly under different scenarios, including successful submissions and validation errors. The tests also cover edge cases like an owner ID mismatch during updates.
